title: Recording of disclaimer
context: ยง526-15 Recording of disclaimer. If an instrument transferring an interest in or power over property subject to a disclaimer is required or permitted by law to be filed, recorded, or registered, the disclaimer may be filed, recorded, or registered. Except as otherwise provided in section 526-12(g), failure to file or record the disclaimer does not affect its validity as between the disclaimant and persons to whom the property interest or power passes by reason of the disclaimer. [L 2000, c 43, pt of ยง1; am L 2011, c 173, ยง4]
